<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o sndloop.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 0dbfs = 1 nchnls = 2
instr 1
itrig = p4 asig diskin2 "beats.wav", 1, 0, 1 ;get the signal in, loop it ktrig line 0, itrig, 1 ;when to trigger signal = p4 kpitch line 1.2, p3, .5 ;vary pitch of recorded signal aout,krec sndloop asig, kpitch, ktrig, .4, 0.05 ;rec starts at p4 sec, for .4 secs and 0.05 crossfade printk2 krec ; prints the recording signal outs aout, aout
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i1 0 5 .5 ;trigger in seconds (=p4) i1 + 5 .8 i1 + 10 1.2
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
